name: machine
description: Build your project with machines: a standard format for JavaScript logic.

scripts.test: nodever=`node -e "console.log('\`node -v\`'[1]);"` && if [ $nodever != "0" ]; then npm run lint; fi && node ./node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha -R dot test/*.test.js
scripts.licensing:
> DEPENDENCIES.md && echo '# Dependency Licenses

> _this recursive dependency licensing report was automatically generated by [`licensing`](https://www.npmjs.org/package/licensing)_

```' >> DEPENDENCIES.md && node node_modules/licensing . >> DEPENDENCIES.md && echo '```' >> DEPENDENCIES.md

author: The Sails Company
